inputs.name: Polling Interval
inputs.help_text: Set the interval in minutes for polling the device attribute server.

inputs.name: Available Servers
inputs.validation: must be a valid server from the list

inputs.name: Selected Servers
inputs.validation: must be a valid server from the list

actions.description: Saves the configuration settings for the device attribute server.
Clears the settings and reverts to default values.

constraints: Polling interval must be set in minutes.
Only servers with valid configurations can be added to the selected servers list.
The feature requires passive collectors to discover endpoints.

errors.message: Polling interval must be a positive integer.
errors.trigger: User enters a non-integer or negative value for polling interval.
User selects a server not listed in available servers.

state_transitions.trigger: Invalid server or polling interval detected.

workflows.name: Configure Device Attribute Server
steps: Navigate to Profiler -> Profiler Configuration -> Device Attribute Server.
Set the polling interval in minutes.
Add or remove servers from the available and selected servers lists.
prerequisites: Ensure passive collectors are configured to discover endpoints.
Ensure valid servers are available for selection.
